summary: An ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 6088 for the improvement of 43rd Avenue West from Emerson Street to Magnolia Boulevard; and certain other streets, avenues and alleys; by paving with portland cement concrete and otherwise improving the same; under Ordinance No. 83953, and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against the several lots, tracts, parcels of land and other property as shown on said roll, establishing a Local Improvement Fund.
